tldr: Affected versions of this package are affected by Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) due to a dynamic regex creation within the credential wrapper, which can result in catastrophic backtracking if the input array includes complex or overlapping patterns. An attacker could craft a large credentials array or inject special characters to cause excessive processing, leading to ReDoS.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@scalar/code-highlight` library to the patch version.
